email.subject: Audit Request: [App/Protocol Name]
email.body:
To Codezen Audit Team,

I am writing to request a quote for a comprehensive audit for our project. Below are the relevant details:

Project Information:
- Project Name: [App/Protocol Name]
- Website URL: [Website URL]
- Technology Stack: [List the technologies used (e.g., Solidity, Rust, Golang, etc.)]
- Project Documentation: [Provide a link to or details of the documentation that may assist in the audit]

Scope of Audit:
- [Provide a link to the project repository]

Specific Areas of Concern (if applicable):
- [Outline any known issues or areas that require specific attention.]

Preferred Timeline (optional):
- [If you have a preferred deadline, please mention it here.]

Best regards,
[Your Full Name]
[Your Job Title]
[Your Company Name]
